title: BOYCOTT
body: I SAY EVERYONE SHOULD BOYCOTT UNTIL RIOT GETS OFF THERE LAZY BEHINDS AND FIXES THIS ISSUE WITH UPDATING TO 6.10 BEEN A WEEK AND I KNOW I STILL CANT GET IN SO IM SURE THERE IS A LARGE NUMBER OF PPL WHO STILL CANT GET IN

replies.body:
Sorry to hear that you still haven't been able to get on yet since the patch :O

I should be able to help you out and get you back into the client, but first I need some additional info:  What sort of problem are you experiencing exactly?  Can you describe it in as much detail as possible?

Reply back and let me know!
Hes probably talking about the red tracker full of help and support related to patch 6.10
wait, if we cant get it then what difference does boycotting make?
